item.title: *Verrucomicrobia* Are Candidates for Polysaccharide-Degrading Bacterioplankton in an Arctic Fjord of Svalbard
item.description:
Cool thing about this paper: Lead author Zena Cardman was an undergraduate student in the Teske Lab at UNC when she did this work. Besides being an all-around awesome person, she is now a NASA Astronaut Candidate.
